comment: /**  * Returns true iff the settings are loaded and retrievable.  */
code: /**  * Returns true iff the settings are loaded and retrievable.  */ boolean isLoaded().

comment: /**  * Returns the names of all secure settings available.  */
code: /**  * Returns the names of all secure settings available.  */ Set<String> getSettingNames().

comment: /**  * Return a string setting. The {@link SecureString} should be closed once it is used.  */
code: /**  * Return a string setting. The {@link SecureString} should be closed once it is used.  */ SecureString getString(String setting) throws GeneralSecurityException.

comment: /**  * Return a file setting. The {@link InputStream} should be closed once it is used.  */
code: /**  * Return a file setting. The {@link InputStream} should be closed once it is used.  */ InputStream getFile(String setting) throws GeneralSecurityException.
